title: 6.2.5 Add marketplace environment configuration
body:
## Parent Issue
#24 - 6.2 AWS Marketplace Integration

## Objective
Add marketplace configuration to application settings.

## Requirements
- MARKETPLACE_ENABLED toggle
- MARKETPLACE_PRODUCT_CODE setting
- TRIAL_MODE for local development
- AWS_REGION for metering API

## Implementation

```python
# src/cloud_optimizer/config.py (additions)
from pydantic_settings import BaseSettings

class Settings(BaseSettings):
    # Existing settings...
    
    # Marketplace settings
    MARKETPLACE_ENABLED: bool = True
    MARKETPLACE_PRODUCT_CODE: str = ""
    TRIAL_MODE: bool = False
    
    # AWS settings
    AWS_REGION: str = "us-east-1"
    
    @property
    def marketplace_config(self) -> MarketplaceConfig:
        return MarketplaceConfig(
            enabled=self.MARKETPLACE_ENABLED,
            product_code=self.MARKETPLACE_PRODUCT_CODE,
        )
    
    class Config:
        env_file = ".env"
```

## Environment Variables
```bash
# .env.example additions
MARKETPLACE_ENABLED=true
MARKETPLACE_PRODUCT_CODE=abc123xyz
AWS_REGION=us-east-1
TRIAL_MODE=false
```

## Files to Modify
- `src/cloud_optimizer/config.py`
- `.env.example`

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Settings load from environment
- [ ] Defaults work for local dev (TRIAL_MODE)
- [ ] Validation errors for missing required values
- [ ] .env.example updated

## Estimated Time
1 hour
